item.title: 第一篇
item.description: 先写一个blog/md的格式规范 +++ //开头 title = "标题名称" draft = "false" //草稿 author = "么了" categories = ["note"] //设置分类，支持数组格式 date = "2019-04-02" description = "" featured = "pic01.jpg" //图片地址 featuredalt = "Pic 1" featuredpath = "date" linktitle = "" type = "post" MetaDataFormat = "toml" languageCode = "en-us" date = "2014-09-29T21:54:53-05:00" Tags = [] +++ //结尾 //+++中间的是设置内容
